mapper.insert: insert into su_user (role_id, username, real_name, password, password_salt, staff_id, create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, status) values (#{roleId}, #{username}, #{realName}, #{password}, #{passwordSalt}, #{staffId}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{modifyUser}, #{modifyTime}, #{status})
mapper.select:
select u.*, r.role_name from su_user u left join su_role r on u.role_id = r.role_id where u.status = 1
and u.username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
and u.staff_id like concat('%', #{staffId}, '%')
order by u.create_time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
